Scenario: Basic Strategy # scr/test/resources/features/Default_Fied_Farm_Basic_Form.feature:9 Given User is on the "Login" screen # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.user_is_on_the_screen(java.lang.String) When User enters username "siva@c4bneeds.com" and password "Test@1234" # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.user_enters_username_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And User clicks on Login button # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_login_button() Create Strategy When User clicks on the button "Create Strategy" button # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_clicks_on_the_button_button(java.lang.String) Successfully clicked on Created Strategy button Given User is landed on Planning Model page # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_is_landed_on_planning_model_page() Landed on page tab Planning Model Then User verify's on "Planning Model" tab that the text "Create Strategy" is displayed # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_verify_s_on_tab_that_the_text_is_displayed(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then User selects "Default Field Farm" Farm Name # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_selects_farm_name(java.lang.String) And User selects "Field Farm1" Strategy Name # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_selects_strategy_name(java.lang.String) And User selects "Field" Planning Model and enters no Available Acres required # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_selects_planning_model_and_enters_no_available_acres_required(java.lang.String) When User clicks on "Income Goal (Optional)" button # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_clicks_on_button(java.lang.String) IncomeGoal value is 10000 Addition of all the values i.e fixedCost and livingExpense and additionalIncome is equal to IncomeGoal And User enters Fixed Costs "2000" and Living Expenses "3000" and Additional Income "5000" and verify's the IncomeGoal value # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_enters_fixed_costs_and_living_expenses_and_additional_income_and_verify_s_the_income_goal_value(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then User clicks at "Save & Next" button # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_clicks_at_button(java.lang.String) Landed on page tab CROPS & CROP INFO Then User verify's on "CROPS & CROP INFO" tab that the text "Crop Choices" is displayed # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_verify_s_on_tab_that_the_text_is_displayed(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) When User clicks on "Field Crops" # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.user_clicks_on(java.lang.String) And under "Field Crops" User selects the below crops # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.under_user_selects_the_below_crops(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) Alfalfa Estimated Cost is 2300 expyied * expprice-prodCost = EstimatedCost where total is 2300and estimated cost is2300 Alfalfa Barley Estimated Cost is 1000 expyied * expprice-prodCost = EstimatedCost where total is 1000and estimated cost is1000 Barley Cotton (upland) Estimated Cost is 380 expyied * expprice-prodCost = EstimatedCost where total is 380and estimated cost is380 Cotton (upland) Then for "Field Crops" User can see the below table and can add details under given below # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.under_user_selects_the_below_crops(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) Cauliflower Estimated Cost is 5800 expyied * expprice-prodCost = EstimatedCost where total is 5800and estimated cost is5800 Cauliflower Broccoli Estimated Cost is 5800 expyied * expprice-prodCost = EstimatedCost where total is 5800and estimated cost is5800 Broccoli Lettuce (iceberg) Estimated Cost is 5800 expyied * expprice-prodCost = EstimatedCost where total is 5800and estimated cost is5800 Lettuce (iceberg) Then for "Fruits and Vegetables" User can see the below table and can add details under given below # stepDefinitions.HomeSteps.for_user_can_see_the_below_table_and_can_add_details_under_given_below(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) And User clicks at
